text:
Fort Hamilton Parkway, (formerly State Road), west side, north from 101st Street, showing the home of Col. James C. and Judge Charles W. Church.

October 1928.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

The same, a closer view.
1933.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
title: Brooklyn: Fort Hamilton - 100th Street

text:
Fort Hamilton Parkway, (formerly State Road), west side, north from 101st Street, showing the home of Col. James C. and Judge Charles W. Church.

title: Brooklyn: Fort Hamilton - 100th Street

text:
(1) Fort Hamilton P'kway., west side, near 101st Street. A view of Judge Church homestead. Charles W. Church, for 40 odd years, Justice of the Peace, in Fort Hamilton. The Judge was in office prior and subsequent to the Civil War.

May 10, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, from another angle.

May 10, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.
